channel.title: Revenge: The New Mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Revenge: The New Mission"

item.title: Re: Revenge: The New Mission
item.content:encoded: Of course, if you just need Revenge, you could easily get YOURSELF bingoed … just spy on a village with insane difficulty, or try to bingo somebody 20 levels off yours…

item.title: Re: Revenge: The New Mission
item.content:encoded:
and on another note

i need to have both. a Note Page bingo would give me the ally and the special mission

thanks in advance to whoever does this. and please do it soon, i would like to get mister tea and to do that i need to use the tools of the trade to make myself immune to the note for a while
Genji - Obvious Village

item.title: Revenge: The New Mission
item.content:encoded:
since it changed from having to have your village attacked, AND needing your village leader to be bingo'ed.

now you only need to be bingo'ed, and this could go hand-in-hand with people who need Note Page bingo's as well as this mission. if you need either note page bingo to gain the ally Anonymous, or you want to be knocked out to get the Revenge mission or both, put a post in here
